scripts.start: npm run bootstrap ; npm run migrate:directus && npm run schema:apply && npm run migrate:internal && npm run data:import && npm run simple-start
scripts.schema:apply: echo 'Applying schema' && npm run directus -- schema apply --yes ./schema.yaml && echo '✅'
scripts.bootstrap: echo 'Bootstraping DB' && npm run directus -- database install && echo '✅'
scripts.migrate:directus: echo 'Running Directus Migrations' && mv ./extensions/migrations ./extensions/migrations_pre && npm run directus -- database migrate:latest && mv ./extensions/migrations_pre ./extensions/migrations && echo '✅'
scripts.migrate:internal: echo 'Running Internal Migrations' && npm run directus -- database migrate:latest && echo '✅'
scripts.data:export: echo 'Exporting data' && npm run directus -- data:export && echo '✅'
scripts.data:import: echo 'Importing data' && npm run directus -- data:import && echo '✅'
scripts.data-migration:import: echo 'Importing data' && eval $(egrep -v '^#' .env.migration.local | xargs) npm run directus -- import && echo '✅'
